General.Name: Yummy Town Cayman Holdings
General.Description: Yummy Town (Cayman) Holdings Corporation engages in the sale and service of food and beverage chain to sell various leisure tea and beverages, snacks, and light meals. It also franchises various brands. The company operates its business under the Real Brew Tea, Happy Lemon, Tai Quan Trading, THE SPICELAND, RBT TEA CAFE, Tea Opal, Hippo Bobatea, and Alma brands. It operates in Mainland China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, the Philippines, South Korea, the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, the Middle East, and other countries. Yummy Town (Cayman) Holdings Corporation was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: The Grand Pavilion Commercial Centre, Shanghai, China, 1208
